title: How to change ward skin?
body: Its probably really easy but i cant for the life of me see where to change the ward skin you're using. I just unlocked a sweet skin and would like to use it but i cant see where to put it on. I remember it used to be in the ward skins section of the shop but no longer there

replies.body: ok never mind just seen it in champ select
You can also change it in store.
